characters.Name: Tracy
characters.Description: She is a middle-aged, American woman. She is a professional lawyer.

characters.Name: Hulk
characters.Description: He is a mutant. He was exposed to radiation and now he is a large, partial human of a creature.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: That's nice to hear. Nice to meet you hulk.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: So you say. You smash things.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: Very nice. I'm going to leave now.
